title: Asian Shares Advance at Open, Gold Edges Lower: Markets Wrap
description: Asian stocks rose modestly in thin holiday trading after US equities whipsawed, with investors concerned about the outlook for AI following days of turbulence that pulled key gauges back from record highs.
content: Asian stocks rose modestly in thin holiday trading after US equities whipsawed, with investors concerned about the outlook for AI following days of turbulence that pulled key gauges back from record highs.
